title: [K-12] Experiential VR Architectural Design Workshop: Creative Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental geometric concepts and 3D spatial cognition skills
context.additional_context: Experience the architectural design process in a real-time collaborative environment using VR equipment, incorporating iterative practice and reflective activities.

learning_goals: Learners can create 3D architectural models considering structural stability and aesthetic elements with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can record problems encountered during the design process in a Reflective Journal and derive at least three improvement plans.
Learners can accept and revise at least two types of feedback on their design proposals through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
